snippet: A grand jury indicted the former officer on charges of felony murder, aggravated assault and other counts in a fatal shooting in June....
abstract: Fulton County, Ga, grand jury indicts white former Atlanta police officer James Burns on charges that include felony murder in connection with killing of Deravis Caine Rogers, unarmed black man, in Atlanta in June.
lead_paragraph: A grand jury indicted the former officer on charges of felony murder, aggravated assault and other counts in a fatal shooting in June.

headline.main: White Ex-Officer in Atlanta Is Indicted in Death of Unarmed Black Man
headline.print_headline: Ex-Officer in Atlanta Is Indicted in Death

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Burns, James R (Atlanta, Ga, Police Officer)
